subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|わらう|yomi=kun}}
Derivation of the verb {{m|ja|笑う|tr=warau||to laugh; to smile}}.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|わらう}}

# to [[laugh]]; to [[smile]] {{attention|ja|this doesn't look like the definition of a noun}}

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|ぽんど|yomi=kun}}
From {{etyl|en|ja|sort=ぽんど}} {{m|en|pound}}. This kanji is an [[当て字|ateji]]. See [[斤]].

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|ポンド}}

# [[pound]] (lb)
# [[pound sterling]] (£)

[[Category:Japanese terms spelled with ateji|ぽんど]]
